Randell "Kydd" Jones bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-emepụta ihe, na onye na-agụ egwu na onye na'ede egwu si Austin, Texas.
Jones rụrụ na NXNE, The Brooklyn Hip-Hop Festival na Red Bull Sound Select na 2014 mgbè ọ na-emepụta màkà Kirko Bangz na Progression V

N'afọ 2015, ọ wepụtara egwu abụọ: Patience na Blink Away na Sean Price; ọ rụkwara na Billboard Hot 100 Fest na Jones Beach Theater. Mgbè Chuck D họpụtara ya n'onwe ya imeghe maka The Hip Hop Gods Tour na Los Angeles na The Novo (nke bụbu Club Nokia), Kydd meghere màkà The Art Of Rap Fest na Lakewood Amphitheatre na Atlanta n'afọ 2016. O wepụtara Sounds in My Head 2: The Righteous Edition ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ na atụmatụ sitere na Skyzoo, Yelawolf, Pac Div, A.Dd+, Cory Kendrix, Max Frost, GLC & Tank Washington. Jones rụrụ na SXSW na Austin City Limits Festival na 2018 na 2019 na Gary Clark Jr Mgbè ọ tọhapụrụ abọm ya akpọrọ Homecoming yana EP ya na ónyé na-emepụta Insightful of Soulection. Ọ gara n'ihu na nke ahụ site n'ịrụ ọrụ na Blues On The Green n'oge 2020 na 2021 ma soro Round Rock Express rụkọọ ọrụ iji sọpụrụ ónyé Austinite na Negro league baseball legend Willie Wells na Austin Black Senators na Dell Diamond. N'afọ 2022, Kydd wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ ya, Onyx D'Or
